mapper.select: select * from (select recruit_req_num,isCanceled,c.id,c.match_num,c.club_num,recruit_position,recruit_accept,type,start_time,end_time,cancel,address,match_date,address_x,address_y,club_name,club_img,club_color,club_age from (select recruit_req_num,isCanceled,a.match_num,a.id,club_num,recruit_accept,recruit_position,type,start_time,end_time,cancel,address,match_date,address_x,address_y from (select * from gentlepro.recruit_req where id=1459494566) a join (select * from gentlepro.match where match_date>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day)) b on a.match_num=b.match_num)c join gentlepro.club d on c.club_num=d.club_num) e left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num,count(*) count from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) f on e.club_num=f.club_num

select * from (select club_num,clubRecruit_num,act_day,act_time,register_cost,month_cost,type,recruit_position,clubRecruit_detail,a.id,club_name,club_img,club_color,club_age,club_address,club_loc,club_locX,club_locY from (select * from gentlepro.club_recruit where clubRecruit_num=#{clubRecruit_num})a join gentlepro.club b using(club_num)) b left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,count(*) count,club_num from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num)c using(club_num)

select * from (select clubRecruit_num,clubRecruit_req_num,b.id,clubRecruit_req_detail,recruit_position,recruit_due,clubRecruit_accept,act_day,act_time,type,club_num,club_address,club_color,filename,club_name,club_age from (select clubRecruit_num,clubRecruit_req_num,a.id,clubRecruit_req_detail,a.recruit_position,recruit_due,clubRecruit_accept,act_day,act_time,type,a.club_num from (select * from gentlepro.clubrecruit_req where id=#{id}) a join gentlepro.club_recruit f using(clubRecruit_num) where recruit_due>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day))b join gentlepro.club e using(club_num))c left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform)perform,club_num from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num)d using(club_num)

select.if: select * from (select nickname,thumbnail_image,a.id,club_num,club_name,club_img,#{match_num} as match_num from (select nickname,thumbnail_image,id,#{club_num} as club_num from gentlepro.member_detail where id=#{id})a left outer join gentlepro.club using(club_num))b left outer join gentlepro.match using(match_num)

select nickname,thumbnail_image,a.id,club_num,club_name,club_img from (select nickname,thumbnail_image,id,#{club_num} as club_num from gentlepro.member_detail where id=#{id})a left outer join gentlepro.club using(club_num)
